# ArXiv daily evals roundup

This index provides daily digests of AI evaluation papers from arXiv. Papers are retrieved using the arXiv API, filtering for submissions containing the terms "AI", "evaluation", and "language model". Each digest includes analysis of papers that evaluate models from major AI labs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, etc.).

**Warning:** The filtering and analysis of papers are generated by Claude. Results may contain errors or miss relevant papers.

**Last updated:** 2025-12-09 11:02 UTC
